alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 2:50PM EST until November 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, mainly west of Cranberry Lake and Wanakena. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall between 7 AM Friday and 7 AM Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
